chinese: 大型语言模型在2026年继续快速发展，多模态能力成为重要发展方向
AI伦理问题受到更多关注，特别是在隐私保护和算法公平性方面
机器学习技术在边缘计算和物联网领域的应用日益广泛
AI助手和自动化工具正在改变工作场所的协作方式
english: Large language models continue rapid development in 2026, with multimodal capabilities becoming a key direction
AI ethics concerns receive more attention, especially regarding privacy protection and algorithmic fairness
Machine learning technologies are increasingly applied in edge computing and IoT fields
AI assistants and automation tools are transforming workplace collaboration methods

chinese: 关注多模态AI技术的发展趋势
重视AI系统的可解释性和透明度
探索AI在特定行业的应用场景
english: Pay attention to trends in multimodal AI technology
Emphasize interpretability and transparency of AI systems
Explore AI application scenarios in specific industries
Strengthen AI safety and risk management
